name: Orrix
appearance: Wind-burnished skin, hair braided in kite-cords; a coat threaded with brass runes humming faintly.
character: Showman inventor with a competitive streak; sees the city as a puzzle of currents.
dreams: mesh the city in a stillness net to tame stormquakes
humble the Tidewrights in Parliament with windproof data
open new glider lanes over the Basilica legally
secrets: keeps a stolen wind-heart stone under the Aerie dais to quiet districts
has siphoned winds from Skyhook Cliffs to punish nonpaying merchants
coaches apprentices to feign natural calms during outages
